response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to cook a frozen pie. From the observed objects, we can see that the cheese_tart_188 is currently frozen and inside the fridge. Therefore, the first step would be to open the fridge and take out the cheese tart.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Move the robot to the fridge
(3) Grasp the cheese tart from the fridge
(4) Move the robot to the oven
(5) Open the oven
(6) Put the cheese tart into the oven
(7) Cook the cheese tart in the oven
